test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y plant))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y table))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X plant)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y bed)))) )
test.nl: There is a bottle which is black on the plant. There is a remotecontrol which is yellow on the table. The door of the microwave is opened. The door of the cupboard is closed. Put a cup which is white on the washmachine. Put a remotecontrol in the cupboard. Put a can in the microwave. Put the yellow remotecontrol in the microwave. Go to the table. Do not go to the plant. The red can must be on the bed.
